named-query.name: User.getByEnabled
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.enabled = ?1

named-query.name: User.getUserByActivationCode
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.activationCode = ?1

named-query.name: User.getByEnabled&EndDateOrderByStartDateDesc
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.enabled = ?1 AND u.dateCreated < ?2 ORDER BY u.dateCreated DESC

named-query.name: User.getByEnabled&EndDate&StartDate
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.enabled = ?1 AND u.dateCreated < ?2 AND u.dateCreated > ?3

named-query.name: User.getByEnabled&EndDate&StartDateOrderByStartDateDesc
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.enabled = ?1 AND u.dateCreated < ?2 AND u.dateCreated > ?3 ORDER BY u.dateCreated DESC

named-query.name: User.getByEnabled&UserNameOrEmailAddressStartsWith
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.enabled = ?1 AND (u.userName LIKE ?2 OR u.emailAddress LIKE ?3)

named-query.name: User.getByEndDateOrderByStartDateDesc
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.dateCreated < ?1 ORDER BY u.dateCreated DESC

named-query.name: User.getByUserName
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.userName= ?1

named-query.name: User.getByUserName&Enabled
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.userName= ?1 AND u.enabled = ?2

named-query.name: User.getByUserNameOrEmailAddressStartsWith
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.userName LIKE ?1 OR u.emailAddress LIKE ?1

named-query.name: User.getByUserNameOrderByUserName
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.userName= ?1 ORDER BY u.userName

named-query.name: User.getByEndDate&StartDateOrderByStartDateDesc
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.dateCreated < ?1 AND u.dateCreated > ?2 ORDER BY u.dateCreated DESC

named-query.name: User.getCountByUserNameLike
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(u) FROM User u WHERE UPPER(u.userName) LIKE ?1

named-query.name: User.getCountEnabledDistinct
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(u) FROM User u WHERE u.enabled = ?1
